parameters.name: AccessKey
parameters.description: The AccessKey ID that is used to connect to EventBridge.

parameters.name: AccessSecret
parameters.description: The AccessKey secret that is used to connect to EventBridge.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the EventBridge integration.

parameters.name: EventBusName
parameters.description: The name of the event bus.

parameters.name: EventBusRegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the event bus.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description:
The ID of the EventBridge integration.

*   If you do not specify this parameter, an EventBridge integration is created.
*   If you specify this parameter, the specified EventBridge integration is modified.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the EventBridge integration.
